--- select_tablesample_with_subquery.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      76,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  76,
        Expr: &parser.SubQueryJoinExpr{
          end:  41,
          Expr: &parser.SubQuery{
            pos:  18,
            end:  41,
            Expr: &parser.Select{
              pos:      19,
              end:      40,
              Distinct: false,
              AsStruct: false,
              List:     parser.SelectExprList{
                &parser.SelectExpr{
                  pos:  26,
                  end:  27,
                  Expr: nil,
                  Star: true,
                  As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
                },
              },
              From: parser.FromItemList{
                &parser.FromItem{
                  end:  40,
                  Expr: &parser.TableName{
                    end:   40,
                    Ident: &parser.Ident{
                      pos:  33,
                      end:  40,
                      Name: "Singers",
                    },
                    Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
                    As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
                  },
                  Method: "",
                  Num:    nil,
                  Rows:   false,
                },
              },
              Where:   nil,
              GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
              Having:  nil,
              OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
              Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
            },
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "BERNOULLI",
        Num:    &parser.IntLit{
          pos:   65,
          end:   67,
          Value: "90",
        },
        Rows: false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(90 PERCENT)
